ovdesc.p: Files that have to be tracked at the end of a service need not be defined in the SEAT.SERVICE.RESULTS.PARAM application and this file need to be carefully defined.

desc.p: If defined on SEAT.APPLICATION.MANAGER - this information needs to be picked up from that file.This field can have any alpabetic characters
This field holds value which is the record ID in the SEAT.APPLICATION.MANAGER file.This field can have any alpabetic characters
The id of this file will be a TSA.SERVICE record.This field can have any alphanumeric characters.
The noraml text that will descripe about the service. This field can have any alphanumeric characters.
Can be specified in a COB service if only certain processes have to be excluded for some files.This field can have any alpabetic characters
This should be an application within a standard selection record.This field can have any alphanumeric characters.
Can be specified in a COB service if only certain processes have to be checked for some files.This field can have any alpabetic characters
